alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Dyer; Haywood; Lauderdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 12:24AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Crockett, southeastern Dyer, southwestern Gibson, northeastern Lauderdale and northeastern Haywood Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1224 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Halls, or 9 miles south of Dyersburg, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dyersburg, Alamo, Halls, Forked Deer, Chestnut Bluff, Bradleytown, Unionville, Eaton, Maury City, Friendship, Gates, Yorkville, Edith, Fowlkes, Lapata, Bonicord, Central, Jenkinsville, Rohoboth and Maury Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
